unnormalised: The auto-rickshaw rattled down Linking Road, each bump threatening to dislodge my suitcase. I clutched my crumpled hotel booking confirmation, the address blurring slightly in the humid Mumbai air: "Hotel Sea Princess, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai - 400049". The driver, a man named Sharma Ji, according to his nameplate, navigated the chaos with practiced ease, honking at scooters and weaving past vendors selling everything from vada pav to Bollywood DVDs. He kept glancing at me in the rearview mirror, a silent question hanging in the air. I knew he was probably wondering why a foreigner was headed to Juhu, not Colaba.
normalised: The auto-rickshaw rattled down Linking Road, each bump threatening to dislodge my suitcase. I clutched my crumpled hotel booking confirmation, the address blurring slightly in the humid Mumbai air: "Hotel Sea Princess, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai - four zero zero zero four nine". The driver, a man named Sharma Ji, according to his nameplate, navigated the chaos with practiced ease, honking at scooters and weaving past vendors selling everything from vada pav to Bollywood D-V-Ds. He kept glancing at me in the rearview mirror, a silent question hanging in the air. I knew he was probably wondering why a foreigner was headed to Juhu, not Colaba.

unnormalised: Eventually, after what felt like an eternity, Sharma Ji pointed a calloused finger towards a towering structure shimmering in the afternoon heat. "Wohi hai, madam! Hotel Sea Princess, address is Juhu Tara Rd, near the beach. Famous hotel, hai na?" He grinned, and I breathed a sigh of relief. The rickshaw meter read Rs. 180, which I happily paid, adding a small tip for his patience. Stepping out onto the pavement, I was immediately engulfed by the sounds and smells of Juhu.
normalised: Eventually, after what felt like an eternity, Sharma Ji pointed a calloused finger towards a towering structure shimmering in the afternoon heat. "Wohi hai, madam! Hotel Sea Princess, address is Juhu Tara Road, near the beach. Famous hotel, hai na?" He grinned, and I breathed a sigh of relief. The rickshaw meter read rupee one hundred and eighty, which I happily paid, adding a small tip for his patience. Stepping out onto the pavement, I was immediately engulfed by the sounds and smells of Juhu.

unnormalised: The hotel itself was impressive, a stark contrast to the vibrant chaos outside. Inside, the cool air conditioning was a welcome respite. I approached the reception desk, a polished marble affair bustling with activity. A smartly dressed receptionist greeted me with a smile. “Good afternoon, ma’am. Welcome to Hotel Sea Princess. May I have your booking confirmation and ID, please?" I handed over my printout with the address and my passport showing address from london. She efficiently typed away at her computer, her fingers flying across the keyboard.
normalised: The hotel itself was impressive, a stark contrast to the vibrant chaos outside. Inside, the cool air conditioning was a welcome respite. I approached the reception desk, a polished marble affair bustling with activity. A smartly dressed receptionist greeted me with a smile. “Good afternoon, ma’am. Welcome to Hotel Sea Princess. May I have your booking confirmation and I-D, please?" I handed over my printout with the address and my passport showing address from London. She efficiently typed away at her computer, her fingers flying across the keyboard.

unnormalised: "Ah, yes, Ms. Eleanor Davies. Booking confirmed for 3 nights, room 205, Juhu Tara Rd location. Our address is clearly marked on the confirmation. Your room rate includes breakfast at our coffee shop, open from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Bellboy will take your luggage up". She handed me my key card and a welcome packet. In it was the hotel’s detailed address, "Hotel Sea Princess, 96/97, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, Maharashtra, PIN code 400049, India", contact number and emergency exits.
normalised: "Ah, yes, Ms. Eleanor Davies. Booking confirmed for three nights, room two zero five, Juhu Tara Road location. Our address is clearly marked on the confirmation. Your room rate includes breakfast at our coffee shop, open from seven zero zero A-M to ten thirty A-M. Bellboy will take your luggage up". She handed me my key card and a welcome packet. In it was the hotel’s detailed address, "Hotel Sea Princess, ninety six slash ninety seven, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, Maharashtra, P-I-N code four zero zero zero four nine, India", contact number and emergency exits.

unnormalised: As I was led to my room, I thought about the journey from the airport to the Hotel. It was classic India, chaotic yet charming, a sensory overload that left you breathless. And now, safe within the cool confines of Hotel Sea Princess, 96/97 Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, I was ready to explore this incredible city.
normalised: As I was led to my room, I thought about the journey from the airport to the Hotel. It was classic India, chaotic yet charming, a sensory overload that left you breathless. And now, safe within the cool confines of Hotel Sea Princess, ninety six slash ninety seven Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, I was ready to explore this incredible city.
